name: Choose your Tower
description: Using functions to draw towers of randomly sized cubes, this program will display all of them for the user to look at and pick their favourite

name: Unstable Cubes 2
description: Instead of looping, it now uses a mouseClicked function to create one field at a time

name: Tree
description: Using autonomous agents, i generate tree/vegetable looking stuff. Click to activate

name: Tree with Wind
description: Now, the trees sway in the wind created by flow fields based on perlin noise. Click to activate

name: Tree with Wind v2
description: The trees have funky colours. Click to activate

name: Paint Balls v1
description: This uses vectors and gravitational attraction towards the mouse and it creates particle-esque paint blobs when clicked

name: Paint Balls v2
description: Intead of creating one paint blob per click, this one creates a streak until another click is triggered

name: Screaming Balls
description: The balls scream when moused over

name: Lava field
description: Based on the trees from a previous experiment, now with a warm pallette they create a sort of network of lava-flows

name: Lava field v2
description: With a more dense collection of lines, now the lava flows across the entire screen, with some stray lines that provide a pop of colour

name: Lava field v3
description: By focusing on a more red and contrasty colour-space, together with a slimey green as the stray colour, this version evokes a much more horrific atmosphere

name: Lava field v4
description: Another change of vibe, this time with more alien and sci-fi feeling colours and shapes

name: Lava field v5
description: with a velocity put at a much higher value, this sort of glitchy streaky effect is created
